seed_pair.target: No escuchará cada palabra que dices.
seed_pair.known: She won't listen to every word you say.

S0523: En lugar de dar una excusa.
S0524: Te llamaré de vuelta en tres o cuatro minutos.
I'll call you back in three or four minutes.
S0525: Para comprobar si has podido terminar.
To check if you've been able to finish.
S0526: Me resulta difícil creer que no puedes adivinar.
I'm finding it hard to believe that you can't guess.
S0527: Adivina quién me contó esa historia graciosa.
Guess who told me that funny story.
S0528: Probablemente se supone que debo guardar esas cosas en otra habitación.
I'm probably supposed to keep those things in another room.
S0529: Can you all put your hands up?
S0531: No es verdad que cualquiera pueda ganar el juego.
It isn't true that anyone can win the game.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
